ai-patthana15.13:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously for him.
ai-patthana15.13:0.3_0: wrapped in a limited object with respect to the formless objects.
ai-patthana15.13:1.1_0: for the sake of a limited object, not with a limited object,
ai-patthana15.13:2.1_0: for the sake of indicating the expansive sense conditions, nor does the object give rise to the reason for the sake of making it.

ai-patthana15.13:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
